Welcome to Sphinx-Test’s documentation!¶

A collection of simple math operations

simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

A function for calculating the value of a first order polynom at given value x

Parameters:

  • x – function value

  • a0 – 0th order term

  • a1 – 1st order term

Returns:

Returns the value of a first order polynom

simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

A function for calculating the value of a second order polynom at given value x

Parameters:

  • x – function value

  • a0 – 0th order term

  • a1 – 1st order term

  • a2 – 2nd order term

Returns:

Returns the value of a second order polynom

simple_math.simple_add(a, b)¶

A function for adding a to b

Parameters:

  • a – first value

  • b – second value

Returns:

Returns the sum

simple_math.simple_div(a, b)¶

A function for deviding a by b

Parameters:

  • a – first value

  • b – second value

Returns:

Returns the quotient

simple_math.simple_mult(a, b)¶

A function for multiplying a and b

Parameters:

  • a – first value

  • b – second value

Returns:

returns the product of the two numbers

simple_math.simple_sub(a, b)¶

A function for subtracting b from a

Parameters:

  • a – first value

  • b – second value

Returns:

Returns the difference
